responses.rationale: The segment describes characteristics of the virus but does not speculate about future relief or improvement.
The segment contains an explicit calming cue about the current state ('risk... remains low'), which is not Q10 speculation without current calming.
The segment reports a past event (sample confirmation) and does not speculate about future relief or improvement.
The segment reports a past event (patient hospitalization) and does not speculate about future relief or improvement.
The segment discusses potential future risk ('would increase the potential risks') but not future relief or improvement.
The segment discusses current interest in data interpretation but does not speculate about future relief or improvement.
The segment poses a question about current data interpretation but does not speculate about future relief or improvement.
The segment discusses current data needs but does not speculate about future relief or improvement.
The segment discusses future data collection ('will soon be collecting') but not future relief or improvement.
The segment reports a past event (human case) and does not speculate about future relief or improvement.
The segment contains an explicit calming cue about the current state ('risk... remains low'), which is not Q10 speculation without current calming.
The segment reports a past event (cows testing positive) and does not speculate about future relief or improvement.
The segment reports past symptoms and does not speculate about future relief or improvement.
The segment reports current/past work location and outbreak status but does not speculate about future relief or improvement.
The segment contains a Q5 Reassuring cue about the current impact ('only suffered conjunctivitis'), which is not Q10 speculation without current calming.
The segment contains Q5 Reassuring cues about the current state ('rare', 'only in people'), which is not Q10 speculation without current calming.
The segment reports past/current events and capabilities ('can be spread') but does not speculate about future relief or improvement.
The segment contains a Q5 Reassuring cue about the current scale ('will only have been about 3.4 million birds killed'), which is not Q10 speculation without current calming.
The segment reports a past event ('first egg-laying operation where bird flu has been found') and does not speculate about future relief or improvement.
The segment reports a past/current situation ('has been dealing with a bird flu outbreak') but does not speculate about future relief or improvement.
The segment reports a past event (virus found) and does not speculate about future relief or improvement.
The segment reports past conditions and does not speculate about future relief or improvement.
The segment reports a past event (death) and symptoms but does not speculate about future relief or improvement.
The segment reports a past event (strain discovery) and does not speculate about future relief or improvement. 'highly pathogenic' is a technical term.

The segment describes future actions framed as safety/clearing measures ('will be safely disposed of', 'will be cleaned and cleared'), which implies current control leading to resolution, not Q10 speculation without current calming.
The segment provides background context ('amid the World Health Organisation advising') and reports a past event (death) but does not speculate about future relief or improvement.
The segment reports a past event (strain identification) and does not speculate about future relief or improvement.
The segment provides background context ('amid the first death') and reports a past event (death) but does not speculate about future relief or improvement.
The segment contains a Q5 Reassuring cue about the current risk level ('can affect humans in rare cases'), which is not Q10 speculation without current calming.
The segment describes natural circulation and capability ('can be spread') but does not speculate about future relief or improvement.
The segment reports a past event (serotype identification) and does not speculate about future relief or improvement.
The segment reports a past event (outbreak report) and does not speculate about future relief or improvement.
The segment describes current attention and capability ('can be transmitted') but does not speculate about future relief or improvement.
The segment reports past events (outbreaks) and current status ('is spreading quickly') but does not speculate about future relief or improvement.
The segment describes how the disease is carried and capability ('can then transmit') but does not speculate about future relief or improvement.
The segment reports a past event (outbreak) and does not speculate about future relief or improvement. 'highly pathogenic' is a technical term.
The segment is a question and does not speculate about future relief or improvement.
The segment reports past/current events (cases, work location, contact) but does not speculate about future relief or improvement.
The segment contains a Q5 Reassuring cue about the current risk level ('rare'), which is not Q10 speculation without current calming.
The segment reports current/past cases but does not speculate about future relief or improvement.
The segment describes capability ('can sometimes jump') but does not speculate about future relief or improvement.
The segment defines the illness and how it spreads but does not speculate about future relief or improvement. 'Highly pathogenic' is a technical term.
The segment reports a past event (outbreak) and does not speculate about future relief or improvement. 'highly pathogenic' is a technical term.
The segment describes current risk ('higher risk') but does not speculate about future relief or improvement.
The segment reports a past event (case detection) and does not speculate about future relief or improvement.
The segment contains an explicit calming cue about the current state ('risk... is considered to be low'), which is not Q10 speculation without current calming.
